info.author: gocept Developers
info.description:
js.rivets
*********

Introduction
============

This library packages `Rivets`_ for `fanstatic`_.

.. _`fanstatic`: http://fanstatic.org
.. _`Rivets`: http://rivetsjs.com

This requires integration between your web framework and ``fanstatic``,
and making sure that the original resources (shipped in the ``resources``
directory in ``js.rivets``) are published to some URL.


How to use?
===========


You can import ``rivets`` from ``js.rivets`` and
``need`` it where you want these resources to be included on a page::

  >>> from js.rivets import rivets
  >>> rivets.need()


CHANGES
*******

0.4.4 (2012-11-28)
==================

- Initial release.
